table.title: Site Details
table.searchString: | inputlookup lookup_sites.csv | rename _time AS "Last Updated" | convert ctime("Last Updated") | table Name Machines Applications Controllers "Last Updated" | rename Name AS "Site Name"

table.title: Health
table.searchString: `xd_index` sourcetype="WMI:Services" SiteName="$SiteName$" `Services-Inf` | stats latest(State) AS State by DisplayName host | stats count BY State | where State!="Running" | appendpipe [stats count | where count == 0] | appendcols [search `xd_index` sourcetype="WMI:Services" SiteName="*" `Services-Inf` | stats count AS serviceCount] | eval Status = if(serviceCount == 0, "No Data", if(count == 0, "All Services Running", count." Service(s) Critical")) | fillnull State value="*" | eval range=if(serviceCount == 0, "elevated", if(count > 0, "severe", "low")) | table Status State range

chart.title: Popular Applications
chart.searchString: `xd_index` sourcetype="xendesktop:*:session" ApplicationsInUse!="" SiteName="$SiteName$" | makemv delim=";" ApplicationsInUse | top limit=10 ApplicationsInUse | rename ApplicationsInUse AS "Application"

chart.title: Users by Site
chart.searchString: `xd_index` sourcetype=xendesktop:*:session SiteName="$SiteName$" | timechart dc(UserName) AS "User Count" by SiteName

table.title: Alerts
table.searchString: `xd_index`_alerts SiteName="$SiteName$" | stats latest(_time) AS latest_alert_time latest(Value) AS Value latest(Severity) AS Severity BY SiteName orig_host AlertName Details | convert ctime(latest_alert_time) AS latest_alert_time | eval View = case( like(AlertName, "%Service Critical"), "services_group", like(AlertName, "CPU %"), "host_proc_detail", like(AlertName, "Memory %"), "host_mem_detail", like(AlertName, "Pages/sec%"), "host_mem_detail", like(AlertName, "Disk%"), "host_disk_detail" ) | sort latest_alert_time | table latest_alert_time SiteName AlertName Severity orig_host Details Value View | rename latest_alert_time AS "Time" AlertName AS Alert orig_host AS Host SiteName AS Site
